Test Name: Varicella-Zoster Virus (VZV) DNA Detection by PCR
Specimen Type: Swabs from vesicular fluid, lesion crusts or throat; cerebrospinal fluid (CSF); blood, serum or plasma
Purpose: To detect the presence of Varicella-Zoster Virus DNA in clinical specimens using PCR.
Equipment: Real-time PCR machine, centrifuge, adjustable pipettes, thermal cycler, vortex mixer
